html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-09402022-09-08,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActInquiries Act
SubjectExtension (Final Report Deadline) - Joint Public Inquiry into the Nova Scotia April 2020 Tragedy
PrecisOrder directing that a COMMISSION be issued under Part I of the INQUIRIES ACT and under the Great Seal of Canada amending the commission in relation to the Joint Public Inquiry into the Nova Scotia April 2020 Tragedy, issued under Order in Council P.C. 2020-822 of October 21, 2020, by replacing “December 15, 2022” with “May 15, 2023” in the paragraph preceding paragraph (a) and by replacing “November 1, 2022” with “March 31, 2023” in paragraph (d).
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Extension (Final Report Deadline) - Joint Public Inquiry into the Nova Scotia April 2020 Tragedy
precis: Order directing that a COMMISSION be issued under Part I of the INQUIRIES ACT and under the Great Seal of Canada amending the commission in relation to the Joint Public Inquiry into the Nova Scotia April 2020 Tragedy, issued under Order in Council P.C. 2020-822 of October 21, 2020, by replacing “December 15, 2022” with “May 15, 2023” in the paragraph preceding paragraph (a) and by replacing “November 1, 2022” with “March 31, 2023” in paragraph (d).
